discourse_list.title: Do we have a hub to show all workstreams?

content.content: Hi all, I find that there are many meaningful workstreams popup in forum, so I am curious whether we have a page (or a hub) to display all these workstreams, so that the community could choose by themselves. Also I love the active engagement now here

Good question, for now I’ve just been creating new tags for each new workstream (you can filter by these to only see the tag you want) but maybe once each workstream gets larger we can create entirely new categories for them?

tags should work, thanks for update. Find the workstream tags like     🧙 🧙‍♀️ Workstream Discussion     Discuss, and even debate topics connected to specific workstreams. The best ideas from here will be immortalized as formal proposals.       Sybil Defenders      Public Goods Funding      Progressive Decentralization (Technical)      Special Projects
